snippet: A Kurdistan government team plans to excavate the site to try to confirm suspicions of executed older Yazidi women whom the Islamic State did not want as sex slaves.
lead_paragraph: A Kurdistan government team plans to excavate the site to try to confirm suspicions of executed older Yazidi women whom the Islamic State did not want as sex slaves.

headline.main: Kurds Investigate Reports of Mass Grave of Yazidis in Sinjar

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
